subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Some see a conflict in Isiah Thomas, the coach of Florida International, also holding a job with the Knicks, but the N.C.A.A. does not.
snippet: Some see a conflict in Isiah Thomas, the coach of Florida International, also holding a job with the Knicks, but the N.C.A.A. does not.
